column7: Explanation of the procedure in the student forum

column3:
We're not even recognized as part of the college and you should create awareness on who we
are and what we do in the clinical areas. We should also have clear objectives written down in
booklet as other departments
Yall do not listen once tou have decided that's it

Poor communication skills and the fact that u don't seem to be on the same table showing
poor team work
I am satisfied with everything except the food
Recognize every carder equally kindly
It's an adult learning institution, but we are treated as children
You involve us when you want to carry out projects only for formality purposes and not because you actually want our opinion or input
Proper protocol guidance,(comment on proffessionalism)
Improve in your involvement on the junior students
The teaching style is okay but sometimes feedback in some areas is delayed or never given

Try improve on the bulk of information you are impacting on students at certain
time let it be about content en how much students understand and not about bulk

some tutors articulate their materials well and bring about critical thinking will others not and
they espect it to be shown in exams
Lack of sufficient clinical instructors to guide students in the clinical areas
I could recommend for slabs at least to maintain the tidiness of the classrooms especially on a Maddy day.

For the classes as RCO we need permanent classrooms ,to avoid the inconveniences of regular
shifting
despite the noises whenever the food is being brought to wards.
For the classroom, there was a lit of noise from the construction
Some rooms are congested in hostels.

The cats are licking the same plates we're using for our meals
.Maybe something should be done concerning that
The food is served very little. Also men are served a large amount of food compared to the ladies
column7: hudles and qR codes and the comi ettee meets every Friday to look at the feedback

column3: Limited recreational facilities and events
For the hostel, esp weekends, the bathrooms are never cleaned until Monday

Hostels are crowded (4 people per room), only 2 sockets available to share among 4 people,
constant invasion by the monkeys and the CCTV placement is cynical
column7: A requirement from regulatory bdy

column3: Hostel are no clean especially Ebenezer

The hostels,, especially the ones outside the hospital environment,,very poorly managed based
on the fact that we pay the same prices as those living in the hostels inside the hospital
Unhygienic and poor quality food in terms pf cooking method
sometimes students miss tea and sometimes we are denied tea if we go past the tea break this is in case of tutors overstaying in classes and releasing us late for tea
Cafeteria sometimes meals provided not well prepared

I think that the girls domitory has a lot of rules that do not make sense and the food in the
cafeteria is not nice
The food is not good ,bad taste n smell
The food sometimes especially lunch it's not fresh
Some members undermining students as they deliver the services (cafteria)

Sometimes, there is hostility( clinical
instruction, its impact on student performance, and our commitment to meeting
students’ expectations.)
Colliding with in charges and sometimes one is not at ease with them

The tutor in charge of clinicals rotation maybe should talk to the nursing incharges to let them
know that we are supposed to be there at that particular time so reduce misunderstanding and
dissapointments
We don't have a guide book, objective clearly defined on what we are supposed to meet
No clinical instructor we relay on incharges..

Some lessons are a bit rushed,and some instructions are given last minute giving us little time
to prepare

Installation of CCTV inside the hostel, despite us being against it, no communication was
made, they were just installed, period!
Delayed feedback

Communication is not consistent.. Assessment days keeps changing which is so
inconveniencing to us
I feel like when yall are making a decision you have already decided their is no discussion

For example when one has done something wrong , you should listen to the students side and
don't be rude about it because everyone makes mistakes and one can learn from there
mistakes
it is important to communicate in time and without being controversial
The meals still ....no improvement despite our complaints

When it comes to our comfort I dare say we
are neglected
School fees should be revised and affordable education provided Improve on time management
Sports, Music and drama as co- cullicular activities.

Am sorry to say this but to be honest, the college food is unsatisfying. The food served is very little. There is also discrimination in serving as the men are served alot of food while the ladies get only a small amount. Many are the times I've queued only to see the male students in front of me served well. My fellow ladies and I keep telling the servers to add us but they add only a little or even tell us to go and come back if we will not be full but when the men ask for more food, the add until the food is filled to the brim. This has been so unfair considering the amount we pay for food.
Easier access to the computer hub
Not listening to the needs of the students, or providing excuses for needs u dont value their importsnce
Meals shld be prepared better
Plates for serving meals are never cleaned properly

Maybe our environment,at time's when it rains,the place is very muddy,i believe we could try to cement our school with pavements,also the drainage system, it's poor, especially the water that drains the way along mortuary also along the field because it's really even damaging our field considering we use the field in graduations and other activities and try to evade soil erosion.
Communication wise,, i feel like students should be aware of the nature of exams and also length of the study is not what we signed for..

Our clinical area, mostly in med Surg placemen,I find it unsatisfying because when students are only used to the routine task like bed baths, administration of medications,feeding and turning they fail to learn a lot,so let's improve to make our clinical more of practicing and leaning,this can be done by having a clinical instructor available to facilitate learning in the clinicals.

I do get the reson of sending some students behind due to indicpline but due to failing one unit
that is not fair towards the parents and the students because sometimes not all students are
blessed with the academic minds
Change the special beans to beans or something else
Please build residential apartments,,we need those,,not as hostels though

Our program planning, clinicals mainly theatre department, we are full time student we need to
have a full working day

There is need to have a clinical instructor available in the clinical area mostly medsurg to make our clinical area more of a learning environment not a task force area.This is because most of the students have gotten used to the routine task allocation in the medical surgical ward, let's also spare sometime to practice whatever we learnt in class guided by a clinical instructor,The school should coordinate with the hospital so that we can have nurses ward round,this will also enable learning to take place. Let's also have more time for simulation when we are in class.Improve the quality of food for students,
POTT students objectives in the ward
Lack of sufficient clinical instructor POTT to guide students in the clinical area
The OS for the POTT
The scope of practice
Mentorship for the POTT/ preceptorship for POTT
When a complain is raised, the progress of you dealing with it is not updated to students
Sometimes no one picks the phone neither calls back after the missed calls
Once we raise an issue of concern it takes a long time for the issue to be sorted out
Our opinios are only needed just for formalities, but action taken is opposite of what we want,
The response is always slow sometimes no response
Students are barely heard,amending tough rules
You don't consider us as people one small mistake you chase us away
You delay , have misplaced priority and even when you seek our response you already know what to do so you do it for formality
Some feedbacks are not usually that encouraging
Most complains or request are delayed so much ,to even a year....but anything affecting the admin is responded too fast.
Yall do not listen once tou have decided that's it
There's a lot of judgement from some stuff,alot of lies too about someone's life,invasion of privacy...it's just too much.
Fair because not once have I texted the school asking a particular matter and they leave me on read or give me unsatisfactory response
Due to some harassment in clinical areas
Its an adult learning institution, but we are treated as children  u try to listen to us but no changes
You involve us when you want to carry out projects only for formality purposes and not because you actually want our opinion or input
Concerning sickness, sometimes your very weak and your told to come for sick sheet or attach medical report yet I am a day scholar and once you explain yourself your told to write apology letter
You chase people away without a second thought. You should consider us. Please review your student handbook those two should be increased.
You're very subjective ....you never want to listen on the second party or if you listen ,you never consider while concluding a repercussion.
Some are rude but in general it's good
I think the library time should be extended abit
I got chased away for not remembering the name of the book I was looking for, it would have been better if I was redirected to an isle where the book could possibly be
According to the official notice library is supposed to be closed at 9pm but immediately at 6pm the library attendant always tells us to get out its time to go home
Need an upgrade on some units and books
Maintain the opening time especially on weekend

The teaching style lacked clarity and engagement at times. There were occasional difficulties understanding key concepts, and feedback on assignments was limited or delayed. More interactive activities and clearer explanations would greatly improve the learning experience.
One week not enough for teaching, reading, absorbing the information and Doing Exams on Friday. A lot of congestion and cramming needed.
I suggest they improve on students involvement such presentation by students
Course outline is not fully covered, sometimes last minute rush to cover some topics, esp in out of time allocated for class:early or late classes
Enforce a rule whereby not more than like not more than an average of 20% of the lessons easier access to the computer hub
At least speed of teaching to be reduced, all other areas are well done.
Fast teaching,just reading through slides, poor method of delivery in some
So far has been good except 1 tutor who used to dictate notes without projecting disadvantaging visual learners.
You ask the issues while already done with the semester, is the goal to help us or the people after us
I have been able to grasp quite much though some units have beea challenge especially those that tutor uses alot of grammar that does not add up to anything
Teaching style, try improve on the bulk of information you are impacting on students at certain time let it be about content en how much students understand and not about bulk

Teaching methodology for most tutors are okay. Kindly offer prompt feedbacks on cats and  assignments done to give students time to do the revisions that will help them revise as well and make corrections where necessary
The tutors delivered the content adequately, but sometimes the teaching style lacked engagement and clarity.
Some tutors articulate their materials well and bring about critical thinking will others not and they espect it to be shown in exams
This was a significant point of discussion, with a focus on improving the quality of food for students.
The students discussed the shortage of kitchen staff
A key point was the need for food to be well-prepared and should be enough for the students as it has been reported several students to miss food
outdated policy and procedures
Delay in the response to maintanace
